summary: Successfully implemented complete Google authentication system with NextAuth.js. Created beautiful authentication UI with modern design, glassmorphism effects, and professional branding. Added session management, route protection, user profile dropdown with logout functionality. Updated documentation with comprehensive setup instructions for Google OAuth configuration.
current_status: Google authentication is fully implemented and functional. Users now see a beautiful sign-in screen before accessing the market intelligence platform. The system includes secure session management, user profile display, and seamless logout functionality.
